text: our books are here to help you get your job done
in general you may use the code in our books in your programs and documentation
you do not need to contact us for permission unless youre reproducing a significant portion of the code
for example writing a program that uses several chunks of code from our books does not require permission
answering a question by citing our books and quoting example code does not require permission
on the other hand selling or distributing a cd rom of examples from oreilly books does require permission
incorporating a significant amount of example code from our books into your products documentation does require permission
an attribution usually includes the title author publisher and isbn
